text: Monti is a given name. Bearers include: * Monti Amundson, American guitar player * Monti L. Belot (born 1943), Senior United States District Judge * Monti Davis (1958–2013), American basketball player * Monti Mohsen (born 2000), Canadian soccer player * Monti Sharp (born 1967), American actor
title: Monti (given name)
